title: Know Your Donors, 7-Eleven Eyes Speedway, Trump Tariff's Steel Suit
itunes:title: Know Your Donors, 7-Eleven Eyes Speedway, Trump Tariff's Steel Suit
description:
Doug Phillips, CIO at University of Rochester, and Bloomberg News Endowments Reporter Janet Lorin discuss controversial philanthropy and the importance of institutions knowing who their donors are. Bloomberg News Deals Reporter Scott Deveau talks about 7-Eleven eyeing Speedway gas stations. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News Metals & Mining Reporter Joe Deaux break down why the biggest fan of Trump's steel tariffs is suing. Bloomberg Opinion Columnist Nir Kaissar shares his take on why Bernie Sanders could be the stock market's best friend. And we Drive to the Close with Bill Page, Senior Portfolio Manager at Essex Investment Management.

Hosts: Jason Kelly and Taylor Riggs. Producer: Doni Holloway. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
